name: Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup
description: An ancient dish, long recorded throughout history. Fresh fish and mutton are stewed together, with the tenderness of the fish and the juiciness of the lamb blending transforming the dish into a true delicacy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup
suspicious.description: An ancient dish, long recorded throughout history. Alas, there's no time to worry about such matters, as the gamey mutton and rank fish vie for dominance within your mouth. Your poor taste buds sure could use an eternity of rinsing after that.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup
normal.description: An ancient dish, long recorded throughout history. Fresh fish and mutton are stewed together, with the tenderness of the fish and the juiciness of the lamb blending transforming the dish into a true delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup
delicious.description: An ancient dish, long recorded throughout history. As the milky white soup slides down the throat, you can only wish you had two stomachs. Eat a pot of this in winter, and you'll wish you were still eating it the following spring.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
